attributes.action: Limit buy2let schemes to make housing market more accessible for first buyers
attributes.background: There are a number of first time buyers - currently renters - unable to access the housing market due to high rental prices, lower income, artificially high house prices dominated by buy-to-let mortgages and investors. This needs to be limited to give everyone a fair opportunity of owning a home.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we're not sure what limits you would like put on buy-to-let schemes.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what changes you would like to see happen.
